== Main Inclusion Report for sourcepackage ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/s/scim-qtimm, available for all supported architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** It brings functionality similar to the immodule for GTK+ to the Qt library. The main goal is to extend and enhance the input method support in the Qt library, in order to provide a modern and powerful multi-language input system.
** See also MainInclusionReportscim
 0. ''Security:''
** No security histroy.
 0. ''Quality assurance:''
** scim-qtimm is well maintained as a sub project of scim-im.org .
** No critial bugs found in ubuntu and debian.
** Other distros like SuSE  Gentoo have shipit defaultly.
 0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** The package meets debian-policy and FHS.
 0. ''Dependencies:''
** All in universe.
